dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3438 : National Laboratories Mean National Security Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to authorize use of grants under the Urban Area Security Initiative and the State Homeland Security Grant Program to work in conjunction with a Department of Energy national laboratory.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Laboratories Mean National Security Act.

section.header: Use of homeland security grant funds in conjunction with Department of Energy national laboratories
section.text: Section 2008(a) of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 (6 U.S.C. 609(a)) is amended in the matter preceding paragraph (1) by inserting including by working in conjunction with a National Laboratory (as defined in section 2(3) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 15801(3)), after plans,.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 1, 2014.
